post.title: samsung a550 vs. toshiba rv530
post.content: hi you guys, i have a big decision to make. i?ve been searching for a new lcd-tv for some time now. the two remaining devices are 1. the toshiba 37rv530 and 2. the samsung 37a557. i just don?t know which series is the better one. which tv should i go for? hope you can help me
